article.title: Status and history for [tgk]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history-entry.para: The OHCHR data seems to suffer from encoding problems, using characters which are not normally part of the Tajik orthography. The following replacements were made:
Thanks to Miikka-Markus Alhonen for pointing out the problems and providing the replacements.

history.history-entry: stage 4: text recovered from the PDF
stage 2: entered in the index, OHCHR identified as the source.
